website_summaries.verdict: The combination of three lighting levels and an easy-on-the-wallet price tag make this a popular go-to for outdoor nighttime illumination.
pros: Levels include dim, bright, and super bright, adjusted with simple button push
Super bright allows for reading and playing cards
No extra tools needed to clamp onto umbrella or tent poles
Four AA batteries – not included – power the light for a long time
cons: Not waterproof and shouldn't be exposed to the elements
Users have received light with no installation instructions and have to look them up online

customer_reviews.title: Well made and you can vary the illumination
customer_reviews.text: This light is very bright if you face the LEDs toward the table. And it gently illuminates the underside of a patio umbrella if the LEDs are faced up and at its highest power. Holds well to a wooden umbrella pole and is very easy to operate the latch that allows you to remove or install the light onto the pole. Batteries last a good long time in this light. Highly recommended. Update: July 23 2017 another customer asked if these would fit his umbrella pole with a diameter of 2.5 inches. I measured it with my calipers and the maximum pole diameter would be an inch and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kitaoka

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: For such a low-priced light, it does a beautiful job lighting up our deck table nice and evenly! In the picture, it is the only light on. If i turned it off it would be pitch black out there. The picture is the light at its brightest setting as well. Very pleased with it! Hopefully it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: CLSanches

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I like to go out on my patio in the evenings to sip a beverage and smoke a cigar. Most times I take my phone and bluetooth speaker with me as well so I can listen to music. The back door light was always too bright so after I purchased an umbrella for my patio table I found the OYOCCO light and decided to give it a try. I absolutely love it. It adds a nice ambience to my outdoor space and just the right amount of light. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Spanish

customer_reviews.title: Ideal lighting solution for entertaining outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Awesome umbrella light, so glad I ordered this! Opens up, and clips shut around umbrella pole. Spring loaded braces ensure the light stays in place but easily maneuvers higher or lower to adjust needed light. 3 different light settings from low, medium, and high allow you the best options for outdoor entertaining. This was money well spent! Be sure you measure your umbrella pole circumference though, just to be sure this is the right size you need. Aim lights up at bottom of umbrella for less light or ambience, aim them downward onto table for family game night and while eating dinner. This was actually the perfect solution for my patio set up to bring plenty of light.
customer_reviews.author: CarryIsRad

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solution to lighting an umbrella-shrouded table without an extension cord. It is easy to install the batteries and easy to mount to the umbrella pole. I recommend mounting it just under the umbrella's thin metal extension arms unit that moves up and down the pole. That allows the umbrella to close in a normal fasion without having to remove the light. I rated the bright light setting as a nine since moving from medium to bright does not add much extra light. I suggest that you don't let that deter you on buying this item as the light still offers a pleasant, intimate effect.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Bargain light...lites bright!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with our light and particularly like the three levels of lighting provided...just add four AA batteries and you are good to go. Note that this unit is NOT waterproof so needs to be removed (takes 5 seconds!) from the umbrella when not in use. We left ours outside and it filled with rainwater. The good news is that we emptied it out and dried everything off and it still works like a charm. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: camaraderie

customer_reviews.title: Simple function
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much for a $15 light. I was amazed at how well this worked. I clasped it onto my umbrella pole in seconds and it was ready to roll. Super easy to put on and take off. There is a dim, medium and high setting. Each accessed by clicking the power button in succession. This light is bright enough to enjoy dinner outside around a large patio table. I used it this Summer/Fall and it worked perfectly. Everyone that saw it really liked it as well and it always became a conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: louconn

customer_reviews.title: So fare so good looks great at night and attaches to umbrella pole ...
customer_reviews.text: So fare so good looks great at night and attaches to umbrella pole food Gives of nice light .Unlike other reviews that said they had to take batteries out to shut off .This has switch and works good I have only had for a week.So not sure about battery life yet .
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kosiba

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT 3 settings
customer_reviews.text: This light is awesome. It has three light settings which is great for lighting up your food in the evening time. No more smelly dim candles that doesn't do the outdoor eating experience justice. Love this little light. Fits great on our umbrella and doesn't keep it from closing. All types of weather have hit this thing and its till keeps on going. Highly recommend this if you like to eat outside on dark nights under your umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella light
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella light! Cheap and fun. Perfect for what I was looking for. Gives that extra light when your outside hanging out. I like that it has different setting of light. For at least my umbrella, I have to put it on and take it off before I close my umbrella, so I can't leave it on all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndzy79

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for late night beach dates or on the patio
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for late night beach dates or on the patio. Provides enough light to be cute and makes it to where you can see things but don’t expect to read a book under this light.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby H.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Warm LEDs with Philips warm LEDs on the gate
customer_reviews.text: Warm light style matches my Phillips warm LEDs in the back perfectly!! Installed perfectly. So easy to use. Extreamly happy with this purchase. The picture shows it more lit than in real life. Lights under the whole 11ft canopy perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Far superior to my 'brand name' version
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect the compact size but lighting is fine. Also surprised that it has 3 'brightness' levels - - 4 center lights only, outer ring of lights on and all lights on for super bright. Far superior to my 'brand name' version.
customer_reviews.author: SuzJonE

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This light ended up being quite a bit small than I thought but, it didn't matter because we absolutely love it! It has 3 light settings and you can leave it on the umbrella pole, no need to put it away every night. The umbrella will still shut down.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting over the patio table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lighting over the patio table. The 3 mode lighting feature lets you adjust how bright you want the table to be, yet it won't disturb the soft setting in the rest of your yard. Very easy to assemble to the umbrella and you can move it up high or bring it lower. I didn't want to buy another umbrella with light already attached and this light can go with you, for when you need a little extra lighting. Great find and price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P. H. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Light up your night!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights! I love that the brightness can be adjusted. Quick and easy installation! Great product! I don't have to turn on the porch light anymore! My husband said it makes the deck look sexy! No one in our neighborhood has these! Does require 4 AA batteries that do not come with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rita's Pic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and very inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and very inexpensive. Had a last minute BBQ with 5 people around the patio table using this as our light source. I'm planning on purchasing another on. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin & Vanessa LeSuer

customer_reviews.title: Very good light
customer_reviews.text: It gives off a lot of light onto the table it is over when all the lights are on. The light it gives off doesn't go past the table due to the umbrella but this fits our needs really well.
customer_reviews.author: JJ35

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Junk
customer_reviews.text: If you found yourself in the barren winter tundra—miles from any civilization—with nothing but the faintest of stars to illuminate the pitch black skies surrounding you on all sides, these cheap plastic pieces of junk STILL wouldn’t be bright enough to help you read a book on how to get home. ABSOLUTE GARBAGE!!! Do not under any circumstances spend your hard earned money on these. I returned both of them, but somehow only got refunded for one  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄ Like they didn’t disappoint me enough in the first place, now they’re going to rip me off. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Ballsagna

customer_reviews.title: Not with the price even with free shipping
customer_reviews.text: The first one of these we ordered arrived quickly but only 1/2 the lights worked. Fair enough got a dud. Sent it back got the second one. The lighting is so dim it's really not worth using. It seems to suck the life out of the batteries also. In order to get much light it requires fresh batteries at each use. Certainly there is a better product our there. It wouldn't take much to improve on this. I would not buy again and would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Akuhl

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product in late October 2018. I used it once when it arrived and it worked as expected. Given weather conditions since then I used it a second time yesterday. One of the four circuits didn’t work—even after several battery changes. When not in use the light remained enclosed under the collapsed umbrella. If the supplier replaces the defective unit I will adjust my review. After submitting my review the supplier contacted me and ask if they they could replace the light for free. I agreed. They sent 2 new ones—one offered a usb option in addition to standard batteries. They both seem to work. Time will tell how reliable they are.
customer_reviews.author: PRipley

customer_reviews.title: Deficient illumination
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly a gimmick, I ordered this item and the illumination is extremely dim you can not identify an item that is more than a foot away. Certainly not suitable for a patio table that you would sit around at night. So I like the concept I returned the 1st product and in good faith ordered a second thinking there is no way the company would sell an item with this insufficient lighting to no avail the second item was identical. I returned this item as well and that was 4 weeks ago as of the time of this review and nothing no return of money. I would not recommend this company based on my experiences.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor pole grip
customer_reviews.text: I am marginally satisfied with the light produced by this inexpensive light but an less so by its mounting function. While it is easy to install, the flimsy plastic mechanism for gripping the pole is inadequate and barely allows the light to hang on. Four hard plastic spring loaded jaws do not apply enough pressure to adequately grip the center pole of my umbrella. It might be more effective with a larger diameter pole or if there were rubber or some other friction producing material on the jaws, but plastic against a smooth surface of the pole with relatively little pressure from the springs simply doesn't work that well. If it weren't so cheap I would send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Good light attachment
customer_reviews.text: Overall, we are happy with our purchase. Here’s a brief pros/cons list. Pros: - feels like durable construction - lights look very nice and have 3 settings for brightness level (can’t imagine why you would want less than full brightness, but the option is available if you want it) - easy to use - doesn’t take away from the look of our umbrella.... nice addition! Cons: - “on/off” button label is upside down - pretty wiggly on the pole so it’s hard to make it stay level (although it doesn’t slide down)..... wish there was a way to tighten it up more - only lights up the table, not the surrounding areas (which is fine for us)
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I’m a bit surprised by this! My hubby and I enjoy our summer evening dinners at our patio table under the umbrella nearly every night but lightning has always been a struggle. I didn’t expect much out of this little light but to my surprise it’s quite perfect. We’ve used it for an average of 2-hours a night for almost 2 weeks and still haven’t had to replace the four, double-AA batteries... which I originally expected would need to be replaced continuously. But not yet! There are three light settings which comes handy. Overall I’m quite happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Bright & easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I tried a solar umbrella and the light quality was very poor. I came across this and thought I would give it a shot - really impressed! A lot less expensive than the solar umbrellas and so much more light! It’s actually almost too bright when facing downward, but facing it upward gives a nice glow. It clamps on tightly to the umbrella pole, and has an easy on/off button on the side. The only con is the light color - I ordered warm white, but it still has a cooler tone to it. I definitely prefer a warmer white, but this will work for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: kaiden22

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Nice lighting. Easy to install. I would have given this 5 stars if it was waterproof. I guess it’s my bad for not checking prior to purchasing, but I assumed since it is marketed for outdoor use it would be waterproof. This is inconvenient. Needs to stored indoors. Yes, the umbrella will keep it dry in light rain, but I live in Georgia. Heavy rains can pop up just about anytime during a Georgia summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Use this one simple trick
customer_reviews.text: This works just like it shows, and clips right onto the umbrella stem. However, used as shown, it feels a bit like you are in an FBI interrogation. The lights are harsh. BUT, if you flip it upside down, so the lights shine up into the umbrella canopy, its amazing. The entire area under the umbrella is lit in soft light, with no direct light in anyone's face. Its a cool effect and actually looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR POWER OUTAGE! Don’t drop it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my patio umbrella. Before I got to use it, a tropical storm caused a blackout here in Dallas. For several days I used this to clamp on my walker I dropped it once and half of the small lights stopped working. The other functions still varied. I hung it on a curtain rod at night. It has fully replaced candles for times of emergency power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Buckin' Cookin'

customer_reviews.title: seems pretty bright
customer_reviews.text: This thing seems pretty bright for being battery operated. easy to assemble. can't leave it on an umbrella and fold it down though, so that kinda sucks. it's plastic, does not feel like it's very thick. Don't think this would stand up long outside to the elements, so probably best to use it and put it away when done. Not sure how long batteries will last. it's nice and bright and wasn't that expensive, has 3 light settings. With this and a few tiki torches, my light options are pretty good outside. I have this on a picnic table, so no deck or patio. Overall I'm happy, but it seems more like it should be $5 not $13.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: We really like this, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: We wanted some light under our patio umbrella as we sit our our patio many evenings past dark. I had low expectations for this light as it was pretty inexpensive, but I was pleasantly surprised at how bright it is, so much so we often turn it to shine up into the umbrella to give us indirect lighting. Batteries last a pretty long time and it is super easy to attach to the umbrella. We simply leave it attached and slide it up and down when in use to get different levels of lighting. The three brightness levels are an added bonus and can give you mood lighting right up to being able to read.
customer_reviews.author: M. Everton

customer_reviews.title: Update: Great Customer Service Reply - 2 out of 3 Aint Bad
customer_reviews.text: I e-mailed the manufacturer and received a speedy reply that they would send me a new one... AND an additional free one as a gift! Wow- talk about great customer service, quick and generous! Well, I have 3 of these. The first one I bought stopped working (tried changing the batteries and there is no rust so it wasn't from being left out in the rain). I bought two more because these light up my patio/yard really nice under the umbrellas. So far the other 2 have been working fine. I don't use them a lot because right now because it has been cold at night, but they are super easy to take on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it BUT...........
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. It's reasonably priced. It works great and put's out an amazing amount of light. The three brightness settings are convenient. The batteries seem to last despite the brightness of the illumination. My only complaint is that I can no longer use it on my umbrella. A tiny plastic clasp, that connects the halves of the light together, on the umbrella pole, has broken off. So it will no longer stay on the pole. Otherwise, this would have been a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: D. English

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last a year. Made sure we brought it inside in case of rain as instructed. First one side stopped working, then the other. While it worked, it was great. But not worth buying a new one every 6-8 months *Update: Seller has made this right, by replacing under warranty. New light seems much better right out of the box. Takes less batteries, and can also be plugged in for use. LEDs are covered, not exposed to weather. Much happier, glad seller appreciates their customers and makes it right.
customer_reviews.author: Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: I'm not greatly impressed. It fits on the pole and holds ok, but it wobbles around, so I'm not sure it'll stay tight in the case of high winds or getting shaken. It's somewhat bright, but not nearly as bright as advertised. All in all, it's pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Macba

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly bright and portable for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how bright these little lights are. They have two hooks to allow you to hang the lights or you can open the casing and attach the lights to any attachment (pole, umbrella tie) or even prop it up. Be careful - when inserting the lights back into the box, I have twice inadvertently clicked the power button on the light and drained my batteries. Easy solution - don’t store them in the original box. The lights are very light and easily portable. Additionally, while they cast bright direct light, from a distance the light is not bright at all. So, the lights are not disturbing to neighbors on, say a community roof top or shared patio.
customer_reviews.author: southerngirlnchi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised. Light snaps around the umbrella pole with a spring-loaded tension mount and illuminates with a push button on the side. It's not as powerful as a corded electric light, but it provides ample visibility for dining, playing a card game, etc. on a table a few feet below. It's also easy to detach and use as a flashlight for cleaning up the patio or making your way back across the yard after an evening outdoors. It's not weatherproof, so be sure to stow it in a dry place after you're finished using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nifty light!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect solution for brightening up an umbrella covered table. We keep the umbrella up on our deck table even when dining there in the evening because there is a tree overhead, and it’s constantly dropping bits. But it can feel a little funny sitting under an umbrella at night. Enter this Patio umbrella Light, which turns your umbrella into an illuminated roof (we aim the lights upward). It’s easy to use, and we just slide it down the pole when the umbrella must be lowered for wind. I like the three levels of light, too. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Criticalthinker

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: The unit I received may be defective - it is supposed to provide three light levels, yet I can only get the first level of lights to turn on. When I press the On/Off button, only the first level of lighting (i.e. the four large LEDs) goes on - however, the other lights do not go on when I press it again for the 2nd and 3rd times. I threw away the box so I am going to try to return it to Amazon for a refund and order another as a replacement. Hope the next unit they send me works as described
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Wax

customer_reviews.title: Light for Flag
customer_reviews.text: This product did not last even a year. Even after replacing batteries with the chargeable batteries the light no longer worked. I am trying again and have ordered another one in April 2020. It has arrived and it is working... we will see for how long this time. I think I should be refunded for my purchase in April 2020 because this light should have lasted a lot longer than 7 months!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Handy, but aggressive lighting with annoying battery installation
customer_reviews.text: A handy object but the advertised photo demonstrates an orangish-halogen style lighting that is much softer and warmer than the actual aggressive lighting the product offers. Also. It takes 4 batteries, and you have to open up a compartment for each. and. every. single. one. ugh, annoying. I guess the benefit is that you just have to replace one battery at a time, as needed specifically? But that might be way more frequent. We'll see; maybe we'll luck out and they will all die around the same time.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW QUIRING

customer_reviews.title: Not really
customer_reviews.text: This runs on a lot of batteries and the cover fell off so we were never really got to use it. It was easy to install and might be right for certain purposes, it's a clever solution but just didn't work out for us at all. If your looking for something like this than it works but if your looking for a lighting solution I would research a bit more
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Mine stopped working after about 2 months-
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled when I got this light for our patio umbrella. Recently it stopped working and I changed the batteries several times to no avail. I tried and tried to get information on how to send it back- I got a QR reader code and took it 35 miles away to a Staples store for return. I was told they would not be able to return it- it had to be a special Staples UPS store that was about 15 more miles away and only open on Mon-Fri. I am frustrated. I want my money back due to a defective product but can't seem to get it taken care of at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lighting!
customer_reviews.text: I ran across this item by happenstance and never knew I was missing this in my life! It changed our whole outdoor experience! We always knew it was dark outback but usually just came in the house if we were doing something that required lighting. Now we don’t have to! We can play cards on the patio, have a nice meal, etc and the lighting adjusts for dim to bright to fit your needs. The price is the best part! I would pay much more for this item. Great deal, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Seller resolved a minor issue with a replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I installed batteries and did not use at all for 3 weeks. When I turned it on with excitement during my first barbecue, it barely lit up and was so dim that I believe that my candle shined brighter. I missed the window on returns so not sure what I can do at this point UPDATE 5/29/2019: the seller contacted me and offered a refund or a tested working product. I opted for the replacement and the product works extremely well. Very happy that the seller stands behind their product. Even after receiving the replacement they reassured me of their one year replacement guarantee!
customer_reviews.author: Sunil K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Not Waterproof  and don’t drop it...no Bueno
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer little light...I used to have to put the spot lights on all the time now I just attach this and I’m good to go...simple to attach and the 3 light settings are perfect for intimate dinner or roudy card game... Batteries last months if you only use when needed...only sad part is that it doesn’t bounce well...it fell and broke the little clasp that holds it in place...now I tape it until I get a new one...
customer_reviews.author: DKVNY

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts a few months...
customer_reviews.text: After three months it no longer works. Battery changes didn't matter, it just won't turn on anymore. We would have it on for up to 3 hours twice a week, no more than that since we aren't in the backyard at night (avoiding mosquitos). It's under an umbrella so not directly in contact with sun and we don't get rainy weather in the summer so not sure why it died completely. While it was working the light was good and the shipping was well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Beeko

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on June 6 and tried it when I recd it. Seemed like it was going to be good. Today is July 13th and it does not light up. Checked batteries and they were all good. Would like to return it but I think it’s too late. Wish the distributor will do something about it. Not even 5 weeks old and never had a chance to use it because weather wasn’t good until now.
customer_reviews.author: Tbirddriver5

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights!
customer_reviews.text: Pop in some batteries (4 AA each, not included) and you have some very bright lights! Three options— High Med Low light. The light is bright cool white. I’ll use them but I probably would have liked a warmer tone when sitting outside at night. These will be very good if you want to read a book outside at night. Maybe too harsh if you’re just relaxing. But if it’s bright light you want, that’s what these deliver!
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingQueen

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Useful, Versatile, 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: (pic - I also bought blue umbrella lights which I was in the process of attaching) The center umbrella light is awesome! As described, a no-brainer to install or use, it is very bright and arrived in a day. I can place the Light low and easily illuminate the entire table, or raise it high and illuminate an area outside the umbrella. Can also be used in a multitude of necessary or creative ways! Very bright and has really improved my evening entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Payton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect solution for our outdoor seating. The light is a warm white (which I prefer) and is plenty of light. We used the lowest setting last night and it was all we needed. Insofar as battery life goes, time will tell. Install was so easy and it can be moved higher or lower on the umbrella pole to suit your needs. The price is right! If you want a little bit of lighting for your umbrella , buy now.
customer_reviews.author: mts01

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!! Buy it now!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!!! Opened it up the first day I got it and was so happy with it. Turned it on at dusk and as it got darker it performed even better. I loved it so much, I bought a second one for another seating area in my backyard that same day. Since then, I’ve also gifted one. For the price, ease of use, and quality, you can’t go wrong. If you’re even thinking about this, just buy it! You’ll be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: C. Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: A great little gadget
customer_reviews.text: If you don't feel like spending a lot of money for a solar umbrella this is a very inexpensive alternative. The case is sturdy, it's easy to install on your umbrella. It has two light settings, the lower one seems sufficient for anything you may need it for. The higher one is if you're reading small print at your patio table or want to get a tan at night! Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: KFM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how bright this light is. This light is incredible for the price. I was actually going to buy a more expensive umbrella light because I thought the quality and brightness would be better. I am so glad I replaced my order from the more expensive umbrella light to these. I am totally satisfied and beyond pleased I am most definitely buying mote of these
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Made my deck sun umbrella so much more useful!
customer_reviews.text: We can now use it to eat dinner outside on warm evenings. We found the lowest brightness to be perfect to eat with, although the setting with the lights all around is certainly pretty. I am now trying the brightest setting but projected upward into our orange umbrella to have a warm glow instead. That just meant popping it off and flipping it over. It is so useful and simple overall.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Great customer service. They care about my negative experience and went above and beyond to make it right. I would not from them again. This was the worst purchase I've made in some time. Installation was a breeze and the brightness was great for the first 3 or 4 uses, but then it was done. I've replaced the batteries at least 4 times! I wouldn't buy this fixture again.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Joseph

customer_reviews.title: A Great Light For The Price!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great reasonably priced light for use under my patio umbrella! Simple to install and lights up the area very well at night. Photo shows all 28 lights lit up which is the brightest setting. Easy to read, enjoy dinner or play a family game by. As noted by another reviewer, in order to release the light fixture to remove you slide the lever versus pressing it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Germano

customer_reviews.title: There are lots of options to use these.
customer_reviews.text: You can aim the lights up or down. Each way fills a need, and you get six lighting options (up and down at three intensities each) from dim (but still very useful) to bright and practical. Right now I like to aim the lights up at full power because my yellow umbrella glows faintly at night that way. We've had lots of rain recently so I don't know how long the batteries will last but so far, so good. I think you'll find these fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty bright, broke during mounting
customer_reviews.text: If it hadn't broke in half while attempting to snap it on my umbrella I would have given a proper review! With batteries installed it was super bright and I was very pleased with the settings, however it broke antutu pieces while trying to attach it to my umbrella Pole so I never got to actually use it! Would love to have a replacement, without having to go through the ringer for money spent
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H.

customer_reviews.title: Holy lights!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the warm light but I'm pretty sure I was shipped the LED light because they are not yellow, they are white lights and VERY bright thus we hardly turn the thing on because it attracts an ungodly amount of bugs and illuminates not just the 4 person table but a 2-3 foot radius around it too. It moves up and down the umbrella pole as you open and close the umbrella which is nice so you don't have to move it or take it off each time.
customer_reviews.author: JLynnRN88

customer_reviews.title: A must for s'mores construction!
customer_reviews.text: My switch on my old umbrella light broke this year when I tried to use it for the first time of the season, so I was on the hunt for a replacement. Saw this one at about half the price I paid for my old one and the great reviews and figured I couldn't go wrong. Been using it for a couple weeks and very happy. Gives enough light even at the lowest level to be able to see what we're doing when constructing s'mores. Also appreciate having the option to select the level of light we want - a feature my old light didn't have. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: CPA Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install. I keep at bottom of umbrella pole on my table umbrella and move it up when I want to use it b/c you won't be able to close umbrella if it's up at top of pole. The light is sufficient for sitting around talking at night and it's not instrusive. The brightest setting is good, not blasting high brightness but enough you could eat, maybe play a game. I would buy again and may for another umbrella over in another part of my yard.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use for a pool party that we were having. I wanted some extra light but didn't want to put up permanent lights. These were very bright and added enough light for everyone to be able to stay outside and comfortably communicate with one another. I did double these up with one pointing up and on pointing down. For the most part we used the ones pointing up and it worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Martan Agnew

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it sadly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it based on its reviews. Seemed to light up pretty well but didn't really try it out properly in the dark. Then I finally had a night party and realized it wasn't bright enough at all. People at my party said I should get lights to go round my patio umbrella and I said already had them on in the center. They laughed when they saw and at that point I realized I wasted my money. Just goes to show you can't always believe the reviews. Unfortunately I passed the point where I could return it so that was my own fault I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Not enough light
customer_reviews.text: the description boasts it has 28 lights but 24 are extremely small. I bought 2 one for front yard umbrella and one for backyard umbrella. it just was not enough light to see my patio table let alone illuminate anything around me. in my personal opinion, I would not buy this. it was super easy to install but it runs on 4 batteries! get an outlet light.
customer_reviews.author: Texas RN Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothigng finer than to sit around your patio table with friends after dark and talking until the wee hours of the morning, but not if you are sitting in the dark. We have a patio umbrella with solar lights on the spokes of the underside of the canopy, but the light that provided was a little too dim for my taste. This light has mutliple settings to illuminate the table and adds just enough light to enhance the illumination provided by the spoke lights to make the setting perfect. Installation took about 5 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Fu Manchu

customer_reviews.title: After Dark ...
customer_reviews.text: ... if you want to sit at your table outside, this is a wonderful, inexpensive option. The light color is pleasant and adjustable to three levels of brightness, perfect for a relaxing evening after dark where you want light focused on your table, not in your eyes or off to the side. Installation and removal is a snap -- you simply secure the light around the umbrella pole on your table.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Meier Wright

customer_reviews.title: The light is bright
customer_reviews.text: This light when purchased was to provide us lighting from the umbrella down onto a round table. The light works fine and the amount of light is adequate to have dinner and clearly see everyone around the table. What I didn't put enough planning into was ensuring the diameter of the umbrella pole was the same size as the hole in the light. I am unable to close the light when around the pole so it has to rest on the frame for the umbrella. The light does work well though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps bugs away!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little light. I was between buying this combined with a new umbrella, or a umbrella with solar lights - obviously went with separate pieces as it made more sense financially. Surprised by how bright it really is. My husband and I like to have date nights on our patio, and we use the light to play cribbage. No problems seeing cards or the board. Best part - it does not attract any flies/bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Decently bright, A bit clumsy to turn on
customer_reviews.text: Setup is super easy, but it does get in the way of the opening/closing mechanisms on the umbrella unless we put it above it. Plus it can be a bit tough to turn on having to reach over the table and up the umbrella to press the button 2-3 times to get adequate lighting. Overall, pleased with the purchase, but it could benefit from an easier button to hit or perhaps a remote.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get any cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave this a single star is because I couldn't post any comments without one. I put fresh batteries in, turned it on, and it worked. Great. Had one, good evening with it. Tried turning it on the next day, and it didn't. Tried new batteries (and why not...batteries go bad, too) and it didn't work, and never has, since that one time. It doesn't get any cheaper. You get what you pay for. Must've gotten a dud. Invest in a product that works more than once, was the lesson I learned. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: reelmensch

customer_reviews.title: Very handy, whether outside or inside
customer_reviews.text: I intended to use this on the patio, but it arrived the day before a bad storm, and I ended up installing it from the chandelier in my dining room, and I used it when I lost power for several hours. It lit up the room well, was easy to install and remove once I got my power back. Not what I intended when I bought it, but I was very glad that I ordered it. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One complaint
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Really enjoy the different light settings. The button placement is my only complaint. It's on the side and when my umbrella comes down it something's bumps the button on, then next time I'm opening my umbrella I'll notice it's been on since last close. Expect to go through batteries faster bc of this. Button needs to be moved to face or top.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This great little gadget is just what I have been looking for - easy to install - perfect lighting for tabletop dining ! This light will cover an entire 48” round patio table for outside dining. The light is directed down rather than eye level and leaves the tabletop free for dining. It eliminates the need for battery operated candles etc.
customer_reviews.author: mary ausec

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome lights!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We have 3 umbrellas so I purchased 3 cool & 3 warm lights. The lights are super versatile. So that we can change up the lightscape whenever & however we want, each umbrella has both a warm & a cool light with one light facing up and one light facing down. I really like that these are different than the usual string umbrella lights that everyone has.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a month, even with little use
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I got it. Unfortunately, I went to turn it on tonight -- exactly one month after I got it -- and it doesn't work. I rarely used it because I wanted to save the batteries for the fall when days get shorter. I'm very disappointed. (And yes, I tried new batteries. No luck.) The return window was yesterday. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Scot M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: A nice light for the umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Just right for the evening and warm weather. A very nice addition to the patio. The lights have the three settings with the last being the brightest. Very easy to install the batteries and install on the umbrella or patio tables. Some lights cost five times the amount and still have the same construction. The lights will easily last one or two seasons. The batteries are very easy to install. Nice light.
customer_reviews.author: SnoopGrampyGramps

customer_reviews.title: Genius!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I thought of designing this light. Oh man, I would have gone on shark tank and become a millionaire! This light is amazing! It has 3 settings. One lights up one way. One another way, or you can put all the lights on at once. Such a cool little gadget. It lights up my patio table beautifully! I highly recommend this light!
customer_reviews.author: Nick/Peart

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Really like this umbrella light! The different brightness levels worked out well. My on suggestion is to have a few lights on top, to so the umbrella is lit. Last one I had apparently was not waterproof and water ruined the battery compartment. I’ll add to this review in a couple of months after we’ve had a few rain showers...
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Best product, lowest price
customer_reviews.text: Has 3 brightness options, even the lowest one lights our whole patio under our giant 12” umbrella. Photos are on the brightest option with no other backyard lights on- crazy bright and easy to use. If I’m nitpicking I’d say that it is still a little more of a cool bright, Not quite like a LED light but still not fully “warm”- still looks great though! Can’t believe this was one of the cheapest ones, can’t imagine it being nicer
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect light to slide onto your patio umbrella pole. Was even able to leave it to the pole while folding up the umbrella. Three brightness settings. It provides a well lit area to allow you to enjoy the warm summer evenings outdoors. You can play table games or even read a book. I like it so much I am re-ordering for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: linda bushaw

customer_reviews.title: Adds ambiance and function !
customer_reviews.text: Wow , I love this on my patio umbrella !! Adds a little ambiance or a light to read by ! Just put in a few batteries , snap it on the umbrella pole , and you are good to go ! Looks like it will last a while , and you can’t miss for $10 ... I may purchase another later ,for a friend ! I like that it was so easy , right out of the box !, And again ,everything I buy on Prime, is here in a jiffy !
customer_reviews.author: hymnsinger

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: I'm reviewing early because its a great invention, easy to install and use... I just haven't really had a chance to use it - yet... I live in Alaska and right now the sun doesn't go down till 11:30 or so there is not a need for a light above the table... Once fall gets here I will definitely revise my review and add a few pictures to show how much light it adds... Fingers crossed...
customer_reviews.author: Kaela_K

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Just what we were looking for.! The lights perfectly Illuminate our patio table with just the right amount of light. There are also multiple settings with different levels of light. We were originally going to purchase an umbrella with lights built in but all of the reviews were mixed which lead us to Believe they break easily. This product is a perfect solution, literally took seconds to set up and if it breaks if can easily be replaced vs replacing an entire umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nifty design and very useful. You lift the latch on the side and the two sides separate so you can easily slide it onto and up the umbrella where you want it. Then close and latch it. The spring loaded edges hold it in place. The lights come in 3 different strengths so you can make it however bright you want. Great for the patio dinner or by the pool at night.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Sting, bright light and great for playing cars
customer_reviews.text: I had read another review, so I knew how to open the catch on the light to install it- not sure it would have been obvious to me that you pull the tab out/up to open the lock. Light works as advertised. I specifically bought it so we could play cards outside at night, and initially wasn’t sure the light would be cast far enough to see the cards (without tipping my hand to my opponents), but it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Karen RN

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done but with 1 major design flaw. The on/off button is on the side of the unit and is very easy to press. When using with an umbrella I don't want to constantly take it on and off and today when I opened my umbrella in the morning the light was on. I'm returning and going to look for something not as flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: JM55

customer_reviews.title: Perfect umbrella light
customer_reviews.text: Great light for our umbrella table. The three settings are perfect to provide just the right lighting for patio dining with ambiance. Would like to have soft white color as choice. They install so easily and look good. smaller then the picture appears on line, but I am glad as it doesn’t stand out, just does the job Reasonable price too. Just ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: lynne r

customer_reviews.title: Proud of this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Gives off a lot of light. It has 3 settings and you can adjust the placement depending on whether you want it high up on the umbrella or low. Easy to take off and on. It also came in handy when I needed to use it as a temporary flashlight. I am very happy with this purchase. Saved me money having to buy a new lighted umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Buckaroo_Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Mostly decent light
customer_reviews.text: It’s got decent lighting for what it is, and I like that it has different lighting strengths to choose from. It seems like it’s a one size fits all, and does go on really easily, but it slips some, and often doesn’t sit exactly even. It’s hard for it to not tilt some to one side, even though it’s not really noticeable when you’re sitting under it and not looking up at it. Overall, it does what I needed it to, and doesn’t break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit but fixed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this light for an umbrella that states Purchased together, finally got time to set it up and the light hole to small fir the light pole that it states Purchased together. Now the return date passed. But what a great company, they contacted me right away and made things right. What great support.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Bright, easy, and check Amazon Warehouse first!
customer_reviews.text: This light is so easy to use and SO bright. My backyard is woods and very dark at night. This worked great when I didn't have any other lights on (motion light, string lights, solars). It’s very bright, perfect amount of light. I popped 4 (new, make sure they’re new) AA batteries in and right away I was impressed. AND my light was an Amazon Warehouse “used” item. Great product. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: jrmp13

customer_reviews.title: update Review
customer_reviews.text: Updated review. I put in a review about a month ago saying how disappointed I was in this product the manufacturer contacted me immediately and told me they were sorry that I was disappointed in the product. They have replace the product with the newer version. The new updated version of this product is so much better. It works with batteries or without batteries. And it is able to be charged now. Great improvement. Fingers crossed I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made but cheap price. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: It’s made from plastic and probably will not last a long time. I keep it indoors after use so it’s keeps our of moisture. The clamp does work well with my umbrella but the post is a bit thin so there is a a bit of a wobble. Price is good and for what it is you can buy it. If it last the summer. Be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Read my review!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this under the impression it was a solar-charged kind of light for my residential flag. BUT I quickly realized it needs 4 AA batteries. My fault for not reading into it. I do like how bright it is. It has 3 settings for brightness levels. I bring it in while it rains due to it using batteries AND it's proper flag etiquette
customer_reviews.author: Ruth G

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for us. We have a patio table on the lanai which does not have electrical outlets close by and no light. This allows us to extend out outside patio use well into the night. Lights our 7 foot table well enough for safety of guests and we can play cards or do whatever with plenty of light. I was skeptical, but good product. We did stock up on AAA batteries. Have no idea how quick we'll go through them yet
customer_reviews.author: Cappy 79

customer_reviews.title: Very dim light. Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Worst light ever. Put brand new batteries in and waited till dark. At the table with friends and turned it on.. It was laughable how awful this light was. Literally did nothing to add extra light. It did turn on and you could tell it was on however, it put out almost no light. I replaced the batteries to check and sure enough the light just isn't bright at all. Going back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works ok.  How hard is it to print letters right side up on a part though?
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. A bit looser than it should be when clamped onto my umbrella pole. Also, maybe a small thing, but the lettering for ON/OFF etc. was printed upside down... now, how does that get by Quality Control? There is only one way it goes on too, not like it could be inverted or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Embedded_Journalist

customer_reviews.title: Bright! Easy to use/install. Battery operated, no remote.
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! Takes 4 AA batteries. I like that it has 3 brightness modes, center lights, perimeter lights or both together. The only thing I wish it had was a remote because the button to turn on/off is on the light itself and I mounted it high on my umbrella pole so it’s hard to reach, I just use a stick now but a remote would be cool for those of us shorties. Other than that this light is bright, easy to “install”, and a totally brilliant invention!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great add on to the patio
customer_reviews.text: We werent expecting too much for such a low cost item, but we are pleasantly surprised. The light is bright and works well. It was really easy to install. Only issue was the wind was blowing when I installed it. The umbrella was lowered and the support riser bar tapped on the light to turn it on when the wind blew. I just had to turn the light to stop that from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley F

product_meta.title: OYOCO Patio Umbrella Light 3 Brightness Modes Cordless 28 LED Lights at 200 lumens-4 x AA Battery Operated,Umbrella Pole Light for Patio Umbrellas,Camping Tents or Indoor Use (Black)
feature_bullets: 1.3 brightness Mode--press once for 4 LED lights(Dim),press twice for 24 LED lights(Bright), or press three times for 28 LED lights(Super Bright).Suit your need for different brightness on different occasions.

2.Convenient--No need for extra tools,easy to clamp to your umbrella with the built-in auto adjustable strong clamp,also can be hung anywhere using the two hooks,pole mounted,fit pole size from 0.86 inch to 1.81 inch in diameter.
3.Energy-saving and Bright--With 28 energy-saving LED bulbs,led energy saving and environmental friendly.
4.Multiple functions--Suitable for camping,BBQ,playing CARDS,or lying on your leisure chair in the evening with your families or friends.
5.Available electrical source--Requires 4*AA batteries (NOT INCLUDED),which can be easily purchased in common shops. Easy to carry and prepare for batteries backup.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars11,215 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
